motionname_en: fcr(2019-20)39 i) a new loan guarantee commitment of $33 billion with an expected maximum expenditure of $5.4 billion to introduce a new loan guarantee product under hkmc insurance limited's sme financing guarantee scheme; ii) an increase in commitment by $2 billion for the dedicated fund on branding, upgrading and domestic sales; iii) extend the geographical coverage of the fund; and iv) an increase in commitment by $1 billion for the export marketing and trade and industrial organisation support fund

motionname_en: proposal of hon claudia mo to seek the house committee's agreement for asking an urgent oral question at the council meeting of 25 october 2017 on the incident concerning mr benedict rogers, deputy chair of the uk conservative party human rights commission, being refused entry into hong kong

motionname_ch: 郭家麒議員建議於2017年11月1日的立法會會議上，在兩項不具立法效力的議員議案以外多加一項根據《議事規則》第16(4)條提出的休會待續議案，以就有關中央對香港"全面管治權"對"一國兩制"、"港人治港"、"高度自治"的影響進行辯論
motionname_en: proposal of dr hon kwok ka-ki to move a motion for adjournment of the council, in addition to two members' motions without legislative effect, under rule 16(4) of the rules of procedure at the council meeting of 1 november 2017 for the purpose of conducting a debate relating to  the impact of the central authorities' "overall jurisdiction" over hong kong on "one country, two systems", "hong kong people administering hong kong" and "a high degree of autonomy"

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意處理3名議員就議程項目VI所提出的議案
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to deal with the motions proposed by three members under agenda item vi

motionname_ch: 議事規則委員會對《議事規則》作出文本修訂及對《內務守則》作相應文本修訂的建議
motionname_en: proposal of the committee on rules of procedure that textual amendments be made to the rules of procedure and consequential textual amendments be made to the house rules

motionname_ch: 陳淑莊議員建議尋求內務委員會同意，在2018年2月7日的立法會會議上就有東區區議員被阻礙進入東區區議會2018年1月30日會議的場地一事提出急切口頭質詢
motionname_en: proposal of hon tanya chan to seek the house committee's agreement for asking an urgent oral question at the council meeting of 7 february 2018 on the incident concerning some members of the eastern district council being obstructed from entering the venue of the eastern district council meeting on 30 january 2018

motionname_ch: 毛孟靜議員建議請求內務委員會同意在2018年3月21日的立法會會議上就商務及經濟發展局涉嫌干預香港電台的編輯自主一事提出急切口頭質詢
motionname_en: proposal of hon claudia mo to seek the house committee's agreement for asking an urgent oral question at the council meeting of 21 march 2018 on the incident concerning the alleged interference with the editorial independence of the radio television hong kong by the commerce and economic development bureau

motionname_ch: 郭家麒議員尋求內務委員會建議，於2018年5月9日的立法會會議上就香港特別行政區政府對香港大學法律系副教授戴耀廷先生在台灣發表有關香港的言論所發出的譴責聲明對本港言論自由及學術自由的影響舉行一項依據《議事規則》第16(4)條提出的休會辯論
motionname_en: request of dr hon kwok ka-ki to seek the house committee's recommendation for the holding of an adjournment debate pursuant to rule 16(4) of the rules of procedure at the council meeting of 9 may 2018 on the impact of the condemnation statement issued by the hong kong special administrative region government against the remarks about hong kong made by mr benny tai yiu-ting, associate professor of the department of law of the university of hong kong, in taiwan on the freedom of speech and the academic freedom in hong kong

motionname_ch: 陳克勤議員尋求內務委員會建議，於2018年5月9日的立法會會議上就"佔領中環"運動發起人之一戴耀廷先生於2018年3月在台灣出席論壇時發表有關香港可以考慮成立獨立國家的言論對香港及國家利益的影響舉行一項依據《議事規則》第16(4)條提出的休會辯論
motionname_en: request of hon chan hak-kan to seek the house committee's recommendation for the holding of an adjournment debate pursuant to rule 16(4) of the rules of procedure at the council meeting of 9 may 2018 on the impact of the remarks made by mr benny tai yiu-ting, one of the initiators of the "occupy central" movement, at a forum held in taiwan in march 2018 that hong kong could consider becoming an independent state on the interests of hong kong and the nation

motionname_ch: 毛孟靜議員建議於2018年5月23日的立法會會議上，在兩項不具立法效力的議員議案以外多加一項依據《議事規則》第16(4)條提出的休會待續議案，以就政府派出俗稱"政府狗仔隊"於立法會大樓內"監察"議員行蹤進行辯論
motionname_en: proposal of hon claudia mo to move a motion for adjournment of the council, in addition to two members' motions without legislative effect, pursuant to  rule 16(4) of the rules of procedure at the council meeting of 23 may 2018 for the purpose of conducting a debate on the government's deployment of the so-called "paparazzi" at the legislative council complex to "monitor" members' whereabouts

motionname_ch: 本委員會支持《廣深港高鐵(一地兩檢)條例草案》在2018年6月6日的立法會會議上恢復二讀辯論
motionname_en: that this committee supports the resumption of the second reading debate on the guangzhou-shenzhen-hong kong express rail link (co-location) bill at the council meeting of 6 june 2018

motionname_ch: 林卓廷議員建議於2018年5月30日的立法會會議上，在兩項不具立法效力的議員議案以外多加一項依據《議事規則》第16(4)條提出的休會待續議案，以就升降機維修保養對市民安全的影響進行辯論
motionname_en: proposal of hon lam cheuk-ting to move a motion for adjournment of the council, in addition to two members' motions without legislative effect, pursuant to rule 16(4) of the rules of procedure at the council meeting of 30 may 2018 for the purpose of conducting a debate on the impact of maintenance of lifts on public safety

motionname_ch: 毛孟靜議員建議於2018年6月6日的立法會會議上，在兩項不具立法效力的議員議案以外多加一項依據《議事規則》第16(4)條提出的休會待續議案，以就香港記者在大陸正常採訪時受公務人員武力干預對新聞自由的影響進行辯論
motionname_en: proposal of hon claudia mo to move a motion for adjournment of the council, in addition to two members' motions without legislative effect, pursuant to  rule 16(4) of the rules of procedure at the council meeting of 6 june 2018 for the purpose of conducting a debate on the impact on freedom of the press arising from hong kong journalists, while carrying out their ordinary journalistic duties on the mainland, being intervened by public officials using force

motionname_ch: 建議採納立法會CB(2)1489/17-18號文件第9(a)及(b)段所載有關輪候名單上研究政策事宜的小組委員會展開工作的擬議時序
motionname_en: proposal to adopt the proposed timeline for the activation of  subcommittees on policy issues on the waiting list as set out in paragraph 9(a) and (b) of lc paper no. cb(2)1489/17-18

motionname_ch: 譚文豪議員建議於2018年6月13日的立法會會議上，在兩項不具立法效力的議員議案以外多加一項依據《議事規則》第16(4)條提出的休會待續議案，以就個別公職人員違反香港國際機場保安規定的事宜進行辯論
motionname_en: proposal of hon jeremy tam to move a motion for adjournment of the council, in addition to two members' motions without legislative effect, pursuant to  rule 16(4) of the rules of procedure at the council meeting of 13 june 2018 for the purpose of conducting a debate on issues relating to violation of security requirements of the hong kong international airport by individual public officers

motionname_ch: 建議由內務委員會主席於2018年6月27日的立法會會議上動議鄭松泰議員提出的議案，以尋求立法會授權委任一個專責委員會調查香港鐵路有限公司涉嫌隱瞞沙田至中環線紅磡站新月台進行的建造工程被指稱不合規格一事
motionname_en: proposal for the chairman of the house committee to move the motion proposed by dr hon cheng chung-tai at the council meeting of 27 june 2018 to seek the council's authorization for the appointment of a select committee to inquire into the incident of the mtr corporation limited's suspected concealment of the alleged substandard construction works carried out at the new platforms of hung hom station of the shatin to central link

motionname_ch: 26位議員建議於2018年6月27日的立法會會議上，在兩項不具立法效力的議員議案以外多加一項由楊岳橋議員動議的不信任立法會主席的議案
motionname_en: proposal of 26 members for hon alvin yeung to move a motion of no confidence in the president of the legislative council, in addition to two members' motions without legislative effect, at the council meeting of 27 june 2018

motionname_ch: 建議於2018年7月11日的立法會會議上動議議案，以尋求立法會授權交通事務委員會，就有關沙田至中環線土瓜灣站和會展站建造工程質量問題行使《立法會(權力及特權)條例》(第 382章)第9(1)條所賦予的權力
motionname_en: proposal to move a motion at the council meeting of 11 july 2018 to seek the council's authorization for the panel on transport to exercise the powers conferred by section 9(1) of the legislative council (powers and privileges) ordinance (cap. 382) in respect of the quality of construction works at to kwa wan station and exhibition centre station of the shatin to central link

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意處理議員提出的議案
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to deal with the motions proposed by members

motionname_ch: 范國威議員建議尋求內務委員會同意，在2018年10月24日的立法會會議上就4條港鐵線於2018年10月16日出現信號故障的事宜提出急切口頭質詢
motionname_en: proposal of hon gary fan to seek the house committee's agreement for asking an urgent oral question at the council meeting of 24 october 2018 on matters relating to the signalling failure that occurred on four mtr lines on 16 october 2018

motionname_ch: 郭家麒議員建議於2018年10月31日的立法會會議上，在兩項不具立法效力的議員議案以外多加一項依據《議事規則》第16(4)條提出的休會待續議案，以就選舉主任宣布某立法會選舉候選人提名無效的決定與《基本法》所訂明的香港居民的基本權利的關係進行辯論
motionname_en: proposal of dr hon kwok ka-ki to move a motion for adjournment of the council, in addition to two members' motions without legislative effect, pursuant to  rule 16(4) of the rules of procedure at the council meeting of 31 october 2018 for the purpose of conducting a debate on the relationship between the decision of the returning officer to declare the nomination of a candidate for a legislative council election invalid and the fundamental rights of hong kong residents stipulated in the basic law

motionname_ch: 毛孟靜議員建議於2018年12月12日的立法會會議上，在已編定的3項不擬具立法效力的議員議案以外多加一項依據《議事規則》第16(4)條提出的休會待續議案，以就選舉主任裁定一名現職立法會議員的鄉郊代表選舉候選人的提名無效，對本港公民的言論自由及合法參選各類型選舉的影響進行辯論
motionname_en: proposal of hon claudia mo to move a motion for adjournment of the council, in addition to three members' motions not intended to have legislative effect already scheduled, pursuant to  rule 16(4) of the rules of procedure at the council meeting of 12 december 2018 for the purpose of conducting a debate on the impact on hong kong citizens' freedom of speech and right to lawfully stand for various elections arising from the returning officer's determination that the nomination of a candidate, a serving legislative council member, for the rural representative election was invalid

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意應根據《議事規則》第75(8)條，向《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律協助法例(修訂)條例草案》委員會提供指引
motionname_en: that this committee agrees that pursuant to rule 75(8) of the rules of procedure, guidelines should be provided to the bills committee on fugitive offenders and mutual legal assistance in criminal matters legislation (amendment) bill 2019

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意處理議員提出的議案
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to deal with the motion(s) proposed by member(s)

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意向《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律協助法例(修訂)條例草案》委員會提供以下指引:"由該法案委員會委員石禮謙議員決定該法案委員會會議的日期、時間及地點，並在會議上按照《內務守則》附錄IV第4至12段的選舉程序負責主持該法案委員會主席選舉，直至選出主席為止。"
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to provide the following guidelines to the bills committee on fugitive offenders and mutual legal assistance in criminal matters legislation (amendment) bill 2019: "that until the chairman of the bills committee is elected, hon abraham shek, member of the bills committee, shall determine the date, time and place of the meeting(s) of the bills committee; and shall be responsible for presiding at the election of the chairman of the bills committee during the meeting(s) in accordance with the election procedure stipulated in paragraphs 4 to 12 in appendix iv of the house rules."

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意通過2019年5月3日舉行的第二十一次內務委員會會議的紀要
motionname_en: that this committee agrees that minutes of the 21st meeting of the house committee held on 3 may 2019 be confirmed

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意就是次內務委員會會議的過程製備逐字紀錄本
motionname_en: that this committee agrees that verbatim transcript be prepared for the proceedings of this house committee meeting

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意由張宇人議員主持對內務委員會主席不信任的議案的相關討論
motionname_en: that this committee agrees that hon tommy cheung to preside over the discussion relating to the motion of no confidence in the chairman of the house committee

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意處理個別議員提出的議案
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to deal with the motions proposed by individual members

motionname_ch: 本委員會不反對《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律協助法例(修訂)條例草案》在2019年6月12日的立法會會議上恢復二讀辯論
motionname_en: that this committee does not raise  objection to the resumption of the second reading debate on the fugitive offenders and mutual legal assistance in criminal matters legislation (amendment) bill 2019 at the council meeting of 12 june 2019

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意周浩鼎議員提出的以下建議: 內務委員會撤銷於2019年4月12日根據《議事規則》第75(4)條成立《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律協助法例(修訂)條例草案》委員會的決定，並安排按內務委員會認為適當的其他方式研究該法案
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to the following proposal put forward by hon holden chow: the house committee shall rescind the decision made on 12 april 2019 under rule 75(4) of the rules of procedure to form the bills committee on fugitive offenders and mutual legal assistance in criminal matters legislation (amendment) bill 2019, and cause the bill to be considered in such other manner as the house committee thinks fit

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意區諾軒議員提出的以下建議: 以立法會先向台方查詢在何種狀況下才會引渡，取得回覆後始進行審議《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律協助法例(修訂)條例草案》為原則，採取區諾軒議員提出的"方案一"、"方案二"或"方案三"
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to the following proposal put forward by hon au nok-hin: on the principle that the legislative council shall first enquire with the taiwan side on the circumstance(s) under which extradition will be sought, and  proceed with the scrutiny of the fugitive offenders and mutual legal assistance in criminal matters legislation (amendment) bill 2019 only after receiving the reply, plan a, plan b or plan c put forward by hon au nok-hin shall be adopted

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意支持邵家臻議員向懲教署申請外出許可以履行其立法會議員的職務
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to support hon shiu ka-chun's application to the correctional services department for leave of absence to carry out his duties as a member of the legislative council

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意處理楊岳橋議員所提出的議案(議案措辭隨附於後)
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to deal with the motions proposed by hon alvin yeung (wording of the motions is attached)

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意處理陳淑莊議員所提出的議案(議案措辭隨附於後)
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to deal with the motions proposed by hon tanya chan (wording of the motions is attached)

motionname_ch: 本委員會同意處理譚文豪議員所提出的議案(議案措辭隨附於後)
motionname_en: that this committee agrees to deal with the motions proposed by hon jeremy tam (wording of the motions is attached)
